name: Ten Candles
description:
Ten Candles is a short Game Jam game written for the WEIRD jam.

The theme was Candles, and so I drew inspiration from the amazing and atmospheric Table Top RPG "Ten Candles" from cavalry games.
The point of the game is to fight the encroaching darkness by keeping the candles lit. As more candles go out, more of THEM appear.

The game was built from scratch using the RPGMV tool over a period of 5 days. It is short, but sweet. I would welcome any feedback about the game at all, good and bad.
